@gesswot: it is. You arent taking into account the black bars at the top and bottom of the screen. They have been removed and hence the top to bottom resolution isnt full 1080 because what would be the point in rendering black bars, it would just waste space. What is really important is the first number, the 1920. This is constant and shows its 1080p
Not 1080p. 1080p is precisely 1920×1080 pixels, considering the format uses 16:9 aspect ratio. Every single time!
THIS IS 1080P. They have just cropped out the black bars on the top and bottom which make the height 816 instead of 1080. But the width is still 1920.
